string-array.name: str_preinstall_programtable_showinfo
string-array.item: TvChannel file no data，plase update the TvChannel file !
请手动先在U盘新建TvChannel文件，才能导出
请勿拔U盘！数据在复制中.....

备注：
 1.搜完台退出菜单后，系统自动将ATV节 
 	 目信息导出至TvChannel文件内。
 	 
 2.清空本地TvChannel内容方法：执行搜台 
 	 后马上再退出即可清空。

1.Click the "download now", and the new software starts downloading. When the download is complete, click "upgrade now" and the device starts upgrading。
2.When the upgrade is complete, the device is in standby mode (red indicator light, Chang Liang). Press the remote power button to start the device。
1.During the upgrade, do not remotely control the equipment or power off the equipment。
2.During the upgrade process, when the device is in black standby for a long time, press the remote control "power" button to boot。
3.After the upgrade, the device will resume factory settings, please reinstall the network settings and other operations。
